text: 1.32: Sng 132.11; Jer 23.5; Mk 5.71.32: 2 Sml 7.12-16; Ais 9.7Mba tar, ana zumgum guigira zɨ bakɨme kɨrga. Ana za kha bigi kharav vu guarara ki Fhe Bakɨme, ana kha zɨn anan kamɨnga, nan Kam ma. Nza mba zɨn vov piin ki Fhe Bakɨme, ana maaŋ anan muuŋv, ana ndim farim, ana won nzɨga Devita ŋana ndigip ŋgu gari guman pan kɨrga.
